name: BRAVE ADVENTURER
description:
BRAVE ADVENTURER - The story of a vagabond who travels through Middle-earth and is the victim of an attack by bandits, resulting in serious injury.
You enter the world of demons through the use of dark magic.



BRAVE ADVENTURER - This is a 2D platform game where you have to play as a character and bypass traps and obstacles to get to a certain goal. You can choose from many levels with different features and mechanics.

But existence in this world turned out to be much more dangerous and threatening to your life than on the surface.
You must do everything possible to get out of there and return to your world.
You have to fight sinister demons, overcome difficulties and solve puzzles to find a way out of this nightmare.
The only way to survive and return home is to use all your skills and knowledge, and not lose hope of salvation.



Game Features:
-Nice pixel graphics
-Interesting story
-Various levels
